commits.message:
EUCA-12936 - DNS response missing CNAME entries if the TTL has expired.

Description:
 - The xbill DNS Cache mechanism will remove elements if the ttl is 0, yet
   it will return the 'names' of cname records. Causing failed lookups from
   the cache.

Changes:
 - Added NonExpiringCache class which doesn't expire entries and also will add
   entries into the cache when the ttl is 0 so that future lookups will succeed.
 - changed addRRset() and addNegative() to ignore a ttl of zero.
